name: common-denominators
author: Emett Speer, Eric Lakatos
description: A JS function that takes any number of arguments and returns an array of all the common denominators of any numbers supplied

scripts.build-stable: uglifyjs src/index.js -mo build/index.min.js && uglifyjs src/index.js -bo build/index.js
scripts.build: npm run build-current && npm run build-stable
scripts.benchmark: npm run benchmark-stable && npm run benchmark-current
scripts.validate: npm run build-current && jest && npm run benchmark
